intent_atoms.description: Integrate NavigationSplitViewKit Swift Package into FoundationUI module to enable modern navigation split view patterns across the application.
NavigationSplitViewKit dependency added to FoundationUI/Package.swift with version ≥1.0.0.
CI workflows updated to cache the dependency.
All targets build successfully with the new dependency.
No build time regressions (or documented if any).
SPM and Tuist configurations must remain consistent for NavigationSplitViewKit dependency.
Use version pinning ≥1.0.0 for NavigationSplitViewKit to ensure stability.

functional_units.name: SPM Dependency Addition
functional_units.description: Adds NavigationSplitViewKit as a Swift Package Manager dependency to FoundationUI's Package.swift with version pinning and documentation.

functional_units.name: Tuist Manifest Integration
functional_units.description: Mirrors the SPM dependency in Tuist's Project.swift and regenerates lockfiles to include the new package.

functional_units.name: CI/CD Dependency Caching
functional_units.description: Updates GitHub Actions workflows to cache NavigationSplitViewKit, monitors build time impact, and ensures CI can fetch and build it.

functional_units.name: Target Linking Verification
functional_units.description: Verifies that all relevant targets (main, examples, tests) link against NavigationSplitViewKit without linker errors across macOS, iOS, and iPadOS.

functional_units.name: Build Success Validation
functional_units.description: Ensures all targets build successfully with the new dependency and no regressions in build time or test failures.
